scenes.description: FUWAMOCO perform a high-energy dance intro in a fantasy meadow.
Now Loading screen featuring Fuwawa and Mococo sleeping under a tree.
Guided tour of a virtual Akihabara, showcasing various shops and landmarks.
Introduction of 3D Debut Commemorative Tail Keychains.
